current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To amend the Public Health Service Act, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the definition of health insurance coverage certain medical stop-loss insurance obtained by certain plan sponsors of group health plans.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Certain medical stop-loss insurance obtained by certain plan sponsors of group health plans not included under the definition of health insurance coverage

quote.#text: Such term shall not include a stop loss policy obtained by a self-insured health plan or a plan sponsor of a group health plan that self-insures the health risks of its plan participants to reimburse the plan or sponsor for losses that the plan or sponsor incurs in providing health or medical benefits to such plan participants in excess of a predetermined level set forth in the stop loss policy obtained by such plan or sponsor.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 2791(b)(1) of the Public Health Service Act

quote.#text: Such term shall not include a stop loss policy obtained by a self-insured health plan or a plan sponsor of a group health plan that self-insures the health risks of its plan participants to reimburse the plan or sponsor for losses that the plan or sponsor incurs in providing health or medical benefits to such plan participants in excess of a predetermined level set forth in the stop loss policy obtained by such plan or sponsor.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 733(b)(1) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:733/ss:b/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

quote.#text: Such term shall not include a stop loss policy obtained by a self-insured health plan or a plan sponsor of a group health plan that self-insures the health risks of its plan participants to reimburse the plan or sponsor for losses that the plan or sponsor incurs in providing health or medical benefits to such plan participants in excess of a predetermined level set forth in the stop loss policy obtained by such plan or sponsor.
